songs.title: Confession
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
I wonder if you know about it
No, no, no, no, no
I wonder if you know about it
No, no, no

[Verse 1]
A couple bitches were shaking
A couple pictures were taken
We yellin' out "We're so faded"
It was not my intention
The VIP was too crowded
So we had to get out it
She slipped a pill in my drink
I know that excuse is just lousy
But ohh
I needed someone to vent to (I had to talk about it)
I guess it wasn't verbal though
I just needed someone to talk to (I had to talk about it)
She needed some to reverse it on

[Pre-hook]
This is my confession, it wasn't my intention
But this ain't my first time, I guess I'll never learn my lesson
But I guess I deserve it
I'm way too far from perfect
I'm way deep in my zone
And I don't ever think I'll surface

[Hook]
I bet you gon call me, c-c-c-call me
C-c-c call me an asshole
I'm letting my gas, g-gas
G-g-g gas go
I'm boosting my cash, c-cash
C-c-c cash flow
And I'm sick forever, they couldn't heal me like fat hoes

[Refrain]
Now you see me, now you don't
One hoe, two hoes, three hoes, thirty hoes
Bad hoes, dirty hoes
Now you see me, now you don't
One hoe, two hoes, three hoes, thirty hoes
Bad hoes, bad hoes

[Refrain 2]
Slave to the pussy
Slave to the
Slave to the pussy
Wasn't made for this books shit
Slave to the pussy
Slave to the
Slave to the pussy
Wasn't made for this...

[Verse 2]
I bet you anal when a nigga go harder nigga
Too many broads wanna call a nigga
Too many nigga wanna act like they on some bitch
Goddamnit fuck all them niggas
I got tens
They wanna give a nigga brain like surgery
I got tens
With their legs on my shoulder
Damn! That's a burger bitch

[Pre-hook]
This is my confession, it wasn't my intention
But this ain't my first time, I guess I'll never learn my lesson
But I guess I deserve it
I'm way too far from perfect
I'm way deep in my zone
And I don't ever think I'll surface

[Hook]
I bet you gon call me, c-c-c-call me
C-c-c call me an asshole
I'm letting my gas, g-gas
G-g-g gas go
I'm boosting my cash, c-cash
C-c-c cash flow
And I'm sick forever, they couldn't heal me like fat hoes

[Refrain]
Now you see me, now you don't
One hoe, two hoes, three hoes, thirty hoes
Bad hoes, dirty hoes
Now you see me, now you don't
One hoe, two hoes, three hoes, thirty hoes
Bad hoes, bad hoes

[Refrain 2/Outro]
Slave to the pussy
Slave to the
Slave to the pussy
Wasn't made for this books shit
Slave to the pussy
Slave to the
Slave to the pussy
Wasn't made for this books shit
